pullRequest.body:
I need the version of this of type `Finset (Î¹ â†’â‚€ Î¼)`. I therefore rename the `Finset (Î¹ â†’â‚€ Î¼)` from `piAntidiagonal` to `finsuppAnttidiag` since it's not about `Pi` but about `Finsupp`.


---

nodes.body:
### Import summary

No significant changes to the import graph
I am planning on putting `piAntidiag` in there as well, so no need to rename the file
By which you mean that you are planning to insert a `PiAntidiag` for sums over non-necessarily finite sets, but with some finite support assumption?
Yes, I need the finset of functions summing to `n` on a finset `s`.
maintainer merge
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by faenuccio.

Please also rename the file. Otherwise LGTM

bors d+

:v: YaelDillies can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
You mean to `PiAntidiag`?

I thought that if the declaration is `finsuppAntiDiagonal` the file should also be renamed to that. But if you think the filename still captures the (future) content of this file, feel free to keep it as is.

Yeah, the future content should match the file (and I al planning to soon move the file under `Algebra` so really no bother).

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9439997376/job/25998747844)
Overall LGTM, but shouldn't you rename the file `PiAntidiagonal.lean` as well?
Overall LGTM, but shouldn't you rename the file `PiAntidiagonal.lean` as well?

```suggestion
* `Finset.finsuppAntidiag s n` is the finite set of all functions `f : Î¹ â†’ Î¼`
```

```suggestion
  with finite support contained in `s` and such that the sum of its values equals `n : Î¼`
```
Is it perhaps worth adding a small explanation about why the code is what this comment claims it is?
Sorry I didn't write this comment and am not sure how to update it

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: Rename `Finset.piAntidiagonal` to `Finset.finsuppAntidiag`
